Package tp_ed.capturetheflag.game

Class Player

java.lang.Object
tp_ed.capturetheflag.game.Player
public class Player extends Object
The Player class represents a player in the game. It stores information about the player's name, the associated flag, and a circular array queue of bots.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Player(String name)
    Constructs a new player with the specified name.

      public CircularArrayQueue<Bot> getBots()
      Returns the circular queue of bots belonging to the player.

      public Flag getFlag()
      Returns the flag associated with the player.
      Returns:
      The associated flag.

    • addBot

      public void addBot(Bot bot)
      Adds a bot to the player's circular queue of bots.
      Parameters:
      bot - The bot to be added.

    • clearBots

      public void clearBots()
      Clears all bots associated with the player. All bots in the queue are removed.

    • printBotsInfo

      public void printBotsInfo()
      Prints information about all bots associated with the player. Iterates through the circular queue and prints information for each bot.
